posts.post_title: ***SOLD*** Raw 1907 Wolverine News - Charlie Boss Schmidt
posts.post_content:
***SOLD***  Raw 1907 Wolverine News - Charlie Boss Schmidt
------------------------------------------------------------

Originally purchased from Kit Young Cards.

Not pretty.  Rounded corners, light creases, light scruff mark on left foot, stains, pen marks on front, and pencil marks/writing on the back.  

***SOLD*** Asking $ 150.00 but will consider serious offers.


Please add $5.00 towards USPS Priority Mail delivery.

Payment via Paypal Family & Friends.


Thanks
Vincent
